Package com.badlogic.gdx

Interface Summary
Application An Application wraps all features related to game development.
Application.CloseListener Called when application is exiting.
Application.TextInputListener Callback interface for Application.getTextInput()
 

Enum Summary
Application.BlendFunc Blend functions
Application.CullMode Culling modes
Application.DepthFunc Depth test functions.
Application.FontStyle Different styles used by a Font
Application.Keys Keys.
Application.MatrixMode Matrix mode enum
Application.RenderState Renderstates that can be enabled/disabled
Application.TextureFilter Texture filter enum featuring the 3 most used filters.
Application.TextureWrap Texture wrap enum
